item.description:
Soooo sorry for the confusion. I forgot we had moved this from the 2nd Sunday. So I thought we were in a flood. So -- back to before -- 2 locations. Hopefully we'll get a nice day!

Doggie Day
400 Tremont near the Arlington St. intersection

Boston Common (meet near Boylston T stop).

Please note in RSVP which location you'll be going to so I can cancel one if it's looking to have little or no attendance. Thanks!
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua June Meetup
